subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: The course at Oakmont, the site of the 107th U.S. Open, got the better of the hampered Phil Mickelson who was six shots off the leader, Nick Dougherty.
snippet: The course at Oakmont, the site of the 107th U.S. Open, got the better of the hampered Phil Mickelson who was six shots off the leader, Nick Dougherty.
